ApacheKafkaCluster.description: Details of how to connect to an Apache Kafka cluster.

BootstrapServers.description: The bootstrap servers string of the Apache Kafka cluster.

AutoScaling.description: Details about auto scaling of a connector.

MaxWorkerCount.description: The maximum number of workers for a connector.

McuCount.description: Specifies how many MSK Connect Units (MCU) as the minimum scaling unit.

MinWorkerCount.description: The minimum number of workers for a connector.

Capacity.description: Information about the capacity allocated to the connector.

CloudWatchLogsLogDelivery.description: Details about delivering logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

Enabled.description: Specifies whether the logs get sent to the specified CloudWatch Logs destination.

LogGroup.description: The CloudWatch log group that is the destination for log delivery.

CustomPluginArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the custom plugin to use.

Revision.description: The revision of the custom plugin to use.

FirehoseLogDelivery.description: Details about delivering logs to Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose.

DeliveryStream.description: The Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream that is the destination for log delivery.

Enabled.description: Specifies whether the logs get sent to the specified Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream.

KafkaCluster.description: Details of how to connect to the Kafka cluster.

KafkaClusterClientAuthentication.description: Details of the client authentication used by the Kafka cluster.

KafkaClusterClientAuthenticationType.description: The type of client authentication used to connect to the Kafka cluster. Value NONE means that no client authentication is used.

KafkaClusterEncryptionInTransit.description: Details of encryption in transit to the Kafka cluster.

KafkaClusterEncryptionInTransitType.description: The type of encryption in transit to the Kafka cluster.

LogDelivery.description: Details of what logs are delivered and where they are delivered.

Plugin.description: Details about a Kafka Connect plugin which will be used with the connector.

ProvisionedCapacity.description: Details about a fixed capacity allocated to a connector.

McuCount.description: Specifies how many MSK Connect Units (MCU) are allocated to the connector.

WorkerCount.description: Number of workers for a connector.

S3LogDelivery.description: Details about delivering logs to Amazon S3.

Bucket.description: The name of the S3 bucket that is the destination for log delivery.

Enabled.description: Specifies whether the logs get sent to the specified Amazon S3 destination.

Prefix.description: The S3 prefix that is the destination for log delivery.

ScaleInPolicy.description: Information about the scale in policy of the connector.

CpuUtilizationPercentage.description: Specifies the CPU utilization percentage threshold at which connector scale in should trigger.

ScaleOutPolicy.description: Information about the scale out policy of the connector.

CpuUtilizationPercentage.description: Specifies the CPU utilization percentage threshold at which connector scale out should trigger.

Vpc.description: Information about a VPC used with the connector.

SecurityGroups.description: The AWS security groups to associate with the elastic network interfaces in order to specify what the connector has access to.

Subnets.description: The list of subnets to connect to in the virtual private cloud (VPC). AWS creates elastic network interfaces inside these subnets.

WorkerConfiguration.description: Specifies the worker configuration to use with the connector.

Revision.description: The revision of the worker configuration to use.

WorkerConfigurationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the worker configuration to use.

WorkerLogDelivery.description: Specifies where worker logs are delivered.

ConnectorArn.description: Amazon Resource Name for the created Connector.

ConnectorDescription.description: A summary description of the connector.

KafkaConnectVersion.description: The version of Kafka Connect. It has to be compatible with both the Kafka cluster's version and the plugins.

Plugins.description: List of plugins to use with the connector.

ServiceExecutionRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role used by the connector to access Amazon S3 objects and other external resources.
